abilities.name: Noble Blood
abilities.description: The blood of their liege grants these Flesh-eaters a supernatural regenerative capacity.

abilities.name: Knightly Exemplar
abilities.timing: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit
abilities.description: Witnessing a Crypt Haunter Courtier's frenzied, blood-spraying assault sends the warriors in their pack into a murderous frenzy.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Crypt Horrors unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit's combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

battleProfile.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Royal Attendant.
